channel.title: HFFFL on Hugo Future Imperfect
channel.description: Recent content in HFFFL on Hugo Future Imperfect

item.title: Test Post 1 - Tidy Data
item.description: Setup library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.2 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.0.4 v dplyr 1.0.2 ## v tidyr 1.1.2 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.4.0 v forcats 0.5.0 ## -- Conflicts ------------------------------------------ tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() Initial Data # years league has been active year <- c(2012:2019) # podium placement first <- c("Mik", "Nate", "Nate", "Chris", "Nate", "Nate", "Dave", "Dave") second <- c("Jon", "Alex", "Ian", "Todd", "Jon", "Chris", "Jon", "Jon") third <- c("Katz", "Katz", "Jack", "Dave", "Katz", "Katz", "Chris", "Todd") Create Tibble podium <- tibble(year, first, second, third) # show data podium ## # A tibble: 8 x 4 ## year first second third ## <int> <chr> <chr> <chr> ## 1 2012 Mik Jon Katz ## 2 2013 Nate Alex Katz ## 3 2014 Nate Ian Jack ## 4 2015 Chris Todd Dave ## 5 2016 Nate Jon Katz ## 6 2017 Nate Chris Katz ## 7 2018 Dave Jon Chris ## 8 2019 Dave Jon Todd Add Variable (column) mutate() - create, modify, & delete variables tbl <- podium %>% mutate(dues = 60, .
